body: Ecuadorian bloggers are encouraged to participate in a Blog Competition [es] organized by the Guayaquil Canton to, "encourage the use of blogs as a platform for expression of ideas by discussing proposals related to public safety in the canton." Visit the site [es] for more details and follow the competition on Facebook and Twitter.

title: Ecuador: Blog Competition Focusing on Public Safety
